member.name: CMC_ADD_ATTRIBUTES_INFO
member.summary: The CMC_ADD_ATTRIBUTES_INFO structure contains certificate attributes to be added to a certificate.

member.name: CMC_ADD_ATTRIBUTES_INFO.cCertReference
member.summary: Count of elements in the rgdwCertReference array.

member.name: CMC_ADD_ATTRIBUTES_INFO.cAttribute
member.summary: Count of the elements in the rgAttribute array.

member.name: CMC_ADD_ATTRIBUTES_INFO.rgAttribute
member.summary: Array of pointers to the certificate attributes to be added.
